peak.description: Peak RMS intensity (0–10000) with 0.01% precision, zero-padded to 5 digits (e.g. 08900 = 89.0%).

average.description: Average RMS intensity (0–10000) with 0.01% precision, zero-padded to 5 digits (e.g. 07200 = 72.0%).

trend.description: Trend in intensity over previous 30 s: r = rising, f = falling, s = steady.

description: MAC (prefix), peak (5), average (5), trend (1). Example: MAC0890007200r = peak 08900 (89.0%), average 07200 (72.0%), trend = r (rising).
